title: MAX 2-Way Rotating Iron
description: Straightens better than a flat iron!  With the tourmaline ceramic rotating barrel and floating plate, hair is straightened and smoothed without ever being crushed or damaged.

asset.author: InStyler Hair
asset.description:
Straightens better than a flat iron!  With the tourmaline ceramic rotating barrel and floating plate, hair is straightened and smoothed without ever being crushed or damaged.

Available at Ulta, Kohl's, Macy's, Target, and other fine retailers.  Or buy it today at instyler.com
